attributes.review: Tik tok isn’t only for teenagers to hurt ur precious fewlings. It’s an app where many different things are shared. There are thousands of Christians trying to spread the word of God. You’re Christian Right? Oh..... only when you need it to fall back on? Oh well I won’t judge. My God doesn’t judge until the day comes that we all have to be. Just a thought.
attributes.title: Can u give this thing 0 stars?

attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded this app. I opened it and I seen a big ugly Cheeto puff. I went to sleep that night scared of my favorite snack. I cried myself to sleep. Then I look in the corner of my room and I see the Cheeto. Scariest moment of my life. 1 STAR.                         .                                                                                                                 .                                                                                      

GenZ do ya thing :)
attributes.title: PARALYSIS

attributes.review: This app is terrible completely glitchy and never fully loading. Don’t really understand the point of having this app it’s like keeping trash on my phone, racist, homophobic, white supremacy, perverted, fake, sexist trash on my phone. There are many others way to describe this app, and good is not one of them. I’d rather download 50 virus than use this app.
attributes.title: Trump 2020

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and provide some talking point to try to defend big man, all this app has provided to me are statistics that just proves the others sides point, not to mention the constant glitching and over whelming political ads, it’s ridiculous you would think a campaign application would be more well rounded and structured. I guess not
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: Glitchy, buggy, slowed down my phone really bad. I don’t even want to give it ONE star. Very, very, VERY disappointed. I wanted to hope for Trump, to educate myself, but the app keeps throwing me out of it. Random pop-ups come up and it’s impossible to navigate. Whether you believe in Trump2020 or not DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! It will destroy your phone and maybe your life!!
attributes.title: Do not download!!

attributes.review: I was trying to praise the holy orange president by downloading this app and then I started  up Minecraft and next thing I  know Im on the floor and the secret service is on top of me saying to jump into lava with netherite gear or else they would kill me so I did and I lost everything now I have to go back to a mine to get diamond thanks a lot app of the holy orange president
attributes.title: This app made me lose my Minecraft gear

attributes.review: i cannot believe this app is even in the App Store! It should’ve been taken down  A G E S   A G O. When I first open the app, it takes forever to load AND sometimes it kicks me out randomly!!!! I’m appalled by the lack of dedication to create this mess you call an app. you might as well take it down right now before anyone else writes more reviews similar to this one.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: My pet rat Sammy LOVES the Cheeto puff❤️but when he found out all the rascal things he done made my pet rat upset. Its devastating to see trumps true colors. My pet rat Sammy and I are  disappointed in you! And as soon as I opened the app 5 ninjas broke into my window and tried to KILL me!!!!😲I give it a 1 star because he is a DISGRACE and has done NOTHING to America but make it worse.
attributes.title: Disappointed 😡 AND almost killed!!!!

attributes.review: i LOVE donald trump, so i wanted to get this app so i could show my love to my big orange god🟠✨ but when i downloaded it, it started GLITCHING!!!!!!!!!!! i was SO scared. whenever i clicked onto the app, it started to glitch and show a big orange face!!!!!!!!! it scared me so much!!!!!!!!! don’t download this app, or else you will be in DANGER!!!!!!!! the app will glitch and cause your phone to BREAK😱😱😱😱😱😱🤗😱 do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!/@@/&:&2&

The app wouldn’t work for my family’s or my iphone. I mean i added it on my phone, then things went downhill.

Three plainclothes LMPD officers executing a no-knock search warrant entered her apartment in Louisville, Kentucky. Say her name. Give her and every other victim justice.
